title: Gold Steadies After Two-Day Drop in Thin Lunar New Year Trading
description: Gold was little changed after a two-day decline, with many Asian markets offline for the Lunar New Year holiday.
content: Gold was little changed after a two-day decline, with many Asian markets offline for the Lunar New Year holiday.
